title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 8000.6 - Subject matter list
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 8000.6 - Subject matter list

State Regulations
(a) The records
access officer shall maintain a reasonably detailed current list by subject
matter of all records in its possession, whether or not records are available
pursuant to Public Officers Law, section 87(2). (b) The subject matter list shall be
sufficiently detailed to permit identification of the category of the records
sought. (c) The subject matter list
shall be updated not less than twice per year. The most recent update shall
appear on the first page of the subject matter list. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
8000.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
